top_comments.comment:
Nicely done but why not put the toilet in the shower area then you can also have privacy plus free up space in the cabinets. Just seems like there is plenty of space to put the toilet in the shower area. Then just move the toilet if you need too... 
With the curtain across the shower the toilet and the other things would be out of sight. give a real bathroom feeling to the area.
Just a thought but maybe your way works better for you... I do love the van.

comments_since_last_sample.body:
Allô Steph !
Est-ce possible d'échanger avec vous si je ne suis pas sur instagram ?

Ça a été un plaisir de voir votre présentation 😊

Stephen really has her van neat and organized. I would have liked her to show the complete shower set up. Also, would hVe liked to see her show the full extent of the canopy. Lost me with the portable toilet in the kitchen cupboard area. Yuk!
